divs: Sighting DetailsRelaxing in the back garden, was a lovely warm evening. I just looked up as iv seen ufo,so before.and over the flats to was a bright light coming over head, there was no sound to the object. As it past over the light never faded,was just like a ball of light. I lost sight of it as went over the house's
trends: There has been one other sighting in Romford
There were no other sightings in Romford on or around August 9th 2012
Summary: A whiteish / blue light never faded at it went over
